attributes.action: Do not make the covid-19 vaccine compulsory
attributes.additional_details: because we can’t be 100% sure about if it works and not everyone wants the vaccine at this early stage.
attributes.background: Do not make the covid-19 vaccine compulsory

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You might like to sign this related petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
